title: Looking for a top laner for team [Gold+]
body:
We're a gold+ team looking for a top laner for the team. The last top laner we had was forced to leave due to circumstances pertaining to his/her work (which we understand). We're looking for a top laner with great communication, decent skills, and has a personality that can mesh well with the team. Due to previous circumstances with past top laners, we're requiring that the tryouts be within the Silver II to Platinum V range (for solo, flex is considered on a case by case basis).

The goals of the team are of the following:

* to be able to improve as a team, learning valuable team skills along the way

* to join tournaments because they're competitive and fun

* to be able to play in a friendly environment and make friends with those on the team

* to have fun playing the game we all like to play 

---

To apply for a tryout please comment below with:

*     your summoner name

*     your age

*     your time zone

*     your rank

*     one interesting fact about you

We're looking to start these again at around 3:00pm CST/4:00pm EST today, and possibly tomorrow (happy mother's day by the way).  If you have questions please address them right before the tryout games. Add BOTH Farrow00 and I after commenting below.
